reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: KonseptiKeidas Oy seeks to establish a joint venture in Mexico City Mexico. The aim of the joint venture is to establish a piloting climbing center in Mexico City. Juha Kurikka of KonseptiKeidas Oy with his peers has done a preliminary study in the target country and found out that there?s nowhere as established climbing culture in Mexico as in European countries. Also the revenue/costs structure seems much more favorable than in Finland with costs much lower and customer prices only slightly lower than in Finland. The current project group Juha Kurikka Rogelio Chavez Miika Koponen Sanna Ingman possess a strong combination of climbing (both business and sport) experience as well as local knowledge Chavez being a local lawyer and Ingman having been responsibl e for large local businesses. The business idea is to combine Finnish/Nordic/European climbing sports (Problemator technique) and business (Finland having far far bigger climbing gym concentration tha Mexico) to the vast customer potential of Mexico City. The first (piloting) climbing center can be established in an former warehouse / industry building on location with good reachability - this a tried concept in Finland and other European countries. From there the concept can be copied to elsewhere in Mexic o City and Mexico. In the process we will help locals to form their own businesses around climbing (for example outdoor climbing guide business is not really developed in Mexico as of now). The employees we will employ directly or through or subcontractors need no high education - we will give them necessary training and hence they can be from the poorest part of population. We seek to establish a formal Ethics Code Environmental Code and Code of Conduct to import Finnish environmental thinking employee res pect and transparent economics into Mexican society.
